summary: The Contoso Wireless phone is a powerful and reliable device with a 5.8 inch display, octa-core processor, and long-lasting battery life. It comes with a 12MP rear-facing and 8MP front-facing camera, and is currently priced at $499.99 USD. Financing options are available to make the purchase more affordable, and it comes with a 1-year manufacturer's warranty. Accessories such as cases, screen protectors, and car chargers are available for purchase separately, and there is a special promotion running where customers who purchase the phone before the end of the month will receive a free wireless charging dock.
